org.intellimate.izou.sdk.contentgenerator

Class EventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intellimate.izou.sdk.contentgenerator.EventListener

  • public class EventListener
extends Object
    This class is used in the ContentGenerator to signal that a ContentGenerator wants to get triggered when it gets fired.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leander Kurscheidt

    • Method Detail

      • createEventListener

        public static Optional<EventListener> createEventListener(String descriptor,
                                                          String description,
                                                          String descriptorID,
                                                          Identifiable identifiable)
                                                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        create the EventListener
        Parameters:
        descriptor - the descriptor of the Event you want to listen to
        description - the description of the descriptor
        descriptorID - an ID for the descriptor (Should contain no special characters, spaces etc.). Only String which match the regex (\w-_)+ are allowed.
        identifiable - the identifiable which wants to create the EventListener
        Returns:
        if one of the parameter is null, or unable to to obtain ID
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the descriptorID contains illegal characters

        Returns the associated Event
        Returns:
